arts.ttl: Barcelona youngster’s availability for Real Sociedad clash currently ‘up in the air’ – report
arts.sum: According to Javi Miguel of AS, Barcelona midfielder Marc Casado’s availability for tomorrow’s game against Real Sociedad is currently ‘up in the air’. The 22-year-old midfielder failed to finish Saturday’s training session at the Ciutat Esportiva, as he was forced off with muscular discomfort. arts.ttl: Real Sociedad manager confident ahead of Barcelona clash – ‘We can take advantage’
arts.sum: FC Barcelona will be aiming to maintain their strong winning momentum as they take on Real Sociedad at home tomorrow. Heading into this crucial game, Real Sociedad manager Sergio Francisco voiced confidence about his team, especially after a narrow win over Mallorca in midweek. arts.sum: Following a 3-1 comeback win against Real Oviedo, FC Barcelona are going to return to action in La Liga on Sunday as they face one of the more formidable sides in the league, Real Sociedad. arts.ttl: Flick talks Garcia, Szczesny, Lamine, Busquets, Madrid derby ahead of Barcelona vs Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Only three days after defeating Real Oviedo 3-1, FC Barcelona are back in action in La Liga, as they take on Real Sociedad on Sunday. The Blaugrana will host the Basque club at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys in Montjuic, with the Spotify Camp Nou still not ready for reopening. arts.ttl: Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys ready to host Barcelona’s games against Real Sociedad and PSG
arts.sum: In a positive development, Mundo Deportivo reports that FC Barcelona have completed the necessary preparations to ensure the Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys is ready to host the team’s next two home fixtures of the season.
